_header: My good dame was one gay wife but she was right gend
Subjects: women, satire directed against; women, erring; wives, erring

Banna.First Lines:
My guddame wes ane gay wyfe bot scho wes rycht gendScho dwelt far
                    furth in france on falkland fell…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Drynk with my guddame quhen ȝe gang byAnis for my
                    saik
